name: Top of the Ladder
description:
Top of the Ladder

You are a mighty archdevil, about to use your Infernal Orb to complete the Dark Ritual, and force all the mortals under your thrall! But the humans caught wind of your plan, and intend to destroy your orb before the ritual completes. And to make matters even worse... your water cooler broke and it's really hurting the morale of your goblins.

Balance being a fearsome final boss with the responsibilities of an office boss! Decide what to do about equipment breaking down, worker protests, and misplaced staplers, while still finding time to mow down humans with your mighty fire magic!

Made for VimJam2 with themes Boss and On The Edge
